Out at sea, they'll probably see a wave that's maybe 0.5-1m(probably less) high, that's what tsunamis look like so far out. The reason for this is that tsunamis have all the water in the ocean moving in a particular direction. Since the ocean is so deep, moving all the water will only cause a slight rise in height, but near the shore, where it's extermely shallow, it has to put all that water somewhere, so it put it in its height. We could work backwards from the height at sea(let's say 1m) and the distance to figure out how high the wave will be when it hits.

Vegas. Now you're thinking of gambling and drunk people and bachelor parties. Nope, that's not in Vegas. You're thinking of paradise. Paradise is an official, non-officially occupied territory, that's where all the casinos are, that's even where the "welcome to Las Vegas!" Sign is. The reason is that the casinos didn't want to pay taxes to the town, the town tried to forcibly take over, the county made it officially non-official territory so that they can't just take over.
